snippet: The new cabinet of Dacian Ciolos, nominated as prime minister in response to accusations of government corruption and inaction, includes ministers with experience at home, abroad and in business.
abstract: Romanian parliament approves government of new prime minister Dacian Ciolos, which features cabinet of experienced technocrats that many citizens had been agitating for.
lead_paragraph: The new cabinet of Dacian Ciolos, nominated as prime minister in response to accusations of government corruption and inaction, includes ministers with experience at home, abroad and in business.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Romania: Parliament Approves New Cabinet Including Technocrats
